utterances.transcript: Oh, what was that for? Like a bake sale?
caption: what was that for a bake sale

utterances.transcript: No, just a Friday night.
caption: no just a friday night

utterances.transcript_with_note: (They all take a bite.)

utterances.transcript: Ohh, these are pretty good.
caption: mm these are pretty good

utterances.transcript: Yeah, but not as good as batch 17.
caption: yeah but not as good as batch 17

utterances.transcript: Which one was that?
caption: which one was that

utterances.transcript: The ones we had right after you almost threw up.
caption: the ones we had after you almost threw up

utterances.transcript: Oh yeah! Batch 17 was good. I did not like batch 16. I'm okay.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Oh yeah! Batch 17 was good. I did not like batch 16. (Burps a little bit.) I'm okay.
caption: oh yeah batch 17 was good i did not like batch 16 i m okay

utterances.transcript: Are there anymore from the good batch? 'Cause we could just work off of those.
caption: are there any more from the good batch we could work off those

utterances.transcript: Yeah, ooh yeah, I think there is one from batch 17 left, uh... It's batch 16! 16 people! Get out of the way!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Yeah, ooh yeah, I think there is one from batch 17 left, uh... (Grabs a cookie and takes a big bite out of it and doesn't like it.) It's batch 16! 16 people! Get out of the way! (Gets up and runs for the bathroom.)
caption: well yeah i think there s one from batch 17 left uh batch 16 sixteen people get out of the way

plots: Ross , Monica and Phoebe attempt to recreate an old family recipe with hilarious results .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: The Mr. Bowmont, its Joey's second lesson with Rachel as the resident sailing expert.]

utterances.transcript: Okay Joey honey, you're doing really good! All right, now I'm just gonna need you to step to the port side. Remember? Remember how we talked about the port side?
utterances.transcript_with_note: Okay Joey honey, you're doing really good! All right, now I'm just gonna need you to step to the port side. (Joey pauses as he tries to remember which side is the port side.) Remember? Remember how we talked about the port side?
caption: okay joey honey you re doing really good i just need you to step to the portside remember how we talked about the portside

utterances.transcript: Ohh yeah.
caption: oh yeah

utterances.transcript: Right?
caption: right

utterances.transcript: Nope.
caption: no

utterances.transcript: It's left sweetie, but that's okay sweetie, that's a tough one.
caption: it s left sweetie but that s okay that s a tough one

utterances.transcript: I don't know why you just don't say left.
caption: why not just say left

utterances.transcript: Okay, go to the left. The left!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Okay, go to the left. (Joey goes starboard or sits on the right side of the boat.) The left!
caption: okay go to the left ahem the left

utterances.transcript: Huh?
caption: huh

utterances.transcript: Just sit over there!!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (yelling) Just sit over there!! (Points to the port side.)
caption: just sit over there

utterances.transcript: Okay! Okay, you're yelling again! See that?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (hurrying over) Okay! Okay, you're yelling again! See that?
caption: okay okay you re yelling again see that

utterances.transcript: No! No-no, no-no-no, very quiet, said with love, no yelling.
caption: oh no no very quiet said with love no yelling

utterances.transcript: Oh, y'know what? Since I'm here, I think I'm gonna have me a little beer on the port side.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Oh, y'know what? Since I'm here, I think I'm gonna have me a little beer on the port side. (Grabs and opens one.)
caption: you know what since i m here i m gonna have a beer on the portside

utterances.transcript: Okay Joey, we're luffing a little bit, so could you tighten up the cunningham?
utterances.transcript_with_note: Okay Joey, we're luffing a little bit, so could you tighten up the cunningham? (The mainsail has started to flap in the wind and has stopped working efficiently; she wants him to tighten it so that it starts working again.)
caption: we re luffing a little will you tighten up the cunningham

utterances.transcript: Uh, wow, you just said a bunch of stuff I didn't know there.
caption: whoa you just said a bunch of stuff i don t know

utterances.transcript: Joey, come on! We just went over this!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Joey, come on! We just went over this! (She does it instead.)
caption: joey come on we just went over this

utterances.transcript: Oh, y'know, when we did that was when that bird was flying overhead with the fish in his mouth. Did you see it? It was gross!
caption: oh when we did that was when that bird was overhead with the fish in his mouth did you see it it was gross

utterances.transcript: No! All right?! I did not see the bird! I did not see the fish! I did not see the piece of Styrofoam that was shaped like Mike Tyson! I did not, because I was trying to teach you how to sail a boat! Which obviously is an impossible thing to do!
utterances.transcript_with_note: (angrily) No! All right?! I did not see the bird! I did not see the fish! I did not see the piece of Styrofoam that was shaped like Mike Tyson! I did not, because I was trying to teach you how to sail a boat! Which obviously is an impossible thing to do!
caption: no i did not see the bird i did not see the fish i did not see the piece of styrofoam shaped like mike tyson i did not because i was trying to teach you how to sail a boat which obviously is an impossible thing to do

utterances.transcript: All right that's it! You're yelling and I don't see you taking your top off! I quit!
caption: that s it you re yelling and i don t see you taking your top off i quit

utterances.transcript: What do you mean you quit?! You can't quit!
caption: what do you mean you can t quit

utterances.transcript: Why not?!
caption: why not

utterances.transcript: Because you're not finished yet and I won't have it! Greens do not quit!
caption: because you re not finished i won t have it greens do not quit

utterances.transcript: Greens? I'm a Tribbiani! And Tribbianis quit!
caption: greens i m a tribbiani tribbianis quit

utterances.transcript: Oh my God, wait did I-I just said Greens don't quit didn't I? Did I just say Greens don't quit?!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Oh my God, wait did I-I just said Greens don't quit didn't I? (Pause) (Angrily) Did I just say Greens don't quit?!
caption: oh my god wait did i i just said greens don t quit didn t i did i say greens don t quit

utterances.transcript: Yes! Yes! You did and you're still yelling at me!
caption: yes and you re still yelling at me

utterances.transcript: No! No! No! I'm not yelling at you, I'm just yelling near you. Oh God Joey, ohh I'm my father. Oh my God, this is horrible! I've been trying so hard not to be my mother I did not see this comin'. Oh, Joey, I'm sorry. I'm so sorry. I just wanted you to learn.
caption: no i m not yelling at you i m just yelling near you oh god joey oh i m my father oh my god this is horrible i ve been trying so hard not to be my mother i did not see this coming ugh joey i m sorry i m so sorry i just wanted you to learn

utterances.transcript: Well, hey I did learn.
caption: hey i i did learn

utterances.transcript: Really?
caption: really

utterances.transcript: Yeah! Come on.
caption: yeah come on

utterances.transcript: Awww...
caption: no

utterances.transcript: Yeah, it's okay. I know what a mainsail is. I know, I know to duck when the boom comes across. I-I know port is right.
utterances.transcript_with_note: Yeah, it's okay. I know what a mainsail is. (Points to it. It's the larger sail.) I know, I know to duck when the boom comes across. I-I know port is right.
caption: yeah it s okay i know what a mainsail is huh i know to duck when the boom comes across i know port is right

utterances.transcript: Left.
caption: left

utterances.transcript: Damnit!
caption: damn it

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, the cookie trying period has pasted. Monica, Phoebe, and Ross are reflecting on the day's events.]

utterances.transcript: Y'know, I bet it would actually make my grandmother very happy to know that we're trying to figure out her recipe. I bet she's l-l-lookin' up at us and smiling right now.
caption: you know i bet it would make my grandma happy to know that we re trying to figure out her recipe i bet she s looking up at us and smiling right now

utterances.transcript: Looking up?
caption: looking up

utterances.transcript: Oh yeah-No, she was really nice to me, but she's in hell for sure.
caption: oh yeah no she was really nice to me but she s in hell for sure

utterances.transcript: Well, I've tried everything. I give up. I guess I'm not gonna be the mom who makes the world's best chocolate cookies. I do make the best duck confit with broccoli rabe. Kids love that right.
caption: well i ve tried everything i give up i m not gonna be the mom who makes the world s best cookies i do make the best duck confit with broccoli raab kids love that right

utterances.transcript: Aww, Pheeb, come on isn't there any relative that would have the recipe? What about, what about your sister?
caption: aw pheeb isn t there any relative that would have the recipe what about your sister

utterances.transcript: Oh no-no, no, I made a promise to myself that the next time I would talk to Ursula would be over my dead body. And that's not happening 'til October 15th, 2032.
caption: oh no i made a promise to myself that the next time i would talk to ursula is over my dead body and that s not happening until october 15 2032

utterances.transcript: That's the day you're gonna die? See-darnit, I've got shuffleboard that day.
caption: that s the day you re gonna die see darn it i ve got shuffleboard that day heh

utterances.transcript: That's what you think.
caption: that s what you think

utterances.transcript: Well, I mean what about friends of your grandmother's? Wouldn't they have the recipe?
caption: what about friends of your grandmother would they have the recipe

utterances.transcript: Well, y'know I may have relatives in France who would know. My grandmother said she got the recipe from her grandmother, Nesele Tolouse.
caption: you know i may have relatives in france who would know my grandmother said she got the recipe from her grandmother nestley toulouse

utterances.transcript: What was her name?
caption: what was her name

utterances.transcript: Nesele Toulouse.
caption: nestley toulouse

utterances.transcript: Nestle Tollhouse?!
caption: nestlé toll house

utterances.transcript: Oh, you Americans always butcher the French language.
caption: ugh you americans always butcher the french language

utterances.transcript: Phoebe, is this the recipe?
utterances.transcript_with_note: (grabbing a bag of Nestle Tollhouse chocolate chips) Phoebe, is this the recipe? (Tosses her the bag.)
caption: phoebe is this the recipe

utterances.transcript: Yes!! Ohh.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (reading the recipe on the back of the bag) Yes!! (Realizes.) Ohh.
caption: yes oh

utterances.transcript: I cannot believe that I just spent the last two days trying to figure out the recipe and it was in my cupboard the whole time!
caption: i cannot believe that i spent the last two days trying to figure out that recipe it was in my cupboard the whole time

utterances.transcript: I know! You see it is stuff like this which is why you're burning in hell!!
utterances.transcript_with_note: I know! You see it is stuff like this which is why (Looking down) you're burning in hell!!
caption: i know you see it is stuff like this which is why you re burning in hell

plots: Phoebe and Monica try to figure out the secret recipe , only to discover that they are Nestle Tollhouse cookies .
Monica is trying to figure out her dead grandmother 's cookie recipe .

Monica finds out that Phoebe 's grandma did n't have a secret recipe and that Phoebe just got the recipe from a bag of Nestle Toll House cookies , when Phoebe says that Phoebe 's grandma got the recipe from Phoebe 's French grandmother
Monica is annoyed that the recipe was Nestle Tollhouse all that time

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: The Gym, Chandler and Mr. Geller are heading for the whirlpool room.]

utterances.transcript: So you understand, I'd feel a lot more comfortable if you didn't tell people what happened. Y'know, I'm a little...I'm a little embarrassed about it.
caption: chandler so you understand i d feel more comfortable if you didn t tell people you know i m a little embarrassed about it

utterances.transcript: I understand completely, there's nothing more horrifying than embarrassing yourself in front of your in-laws. As a matter of fact, when I started dating Judy I was unemployed, and her father asked me what I did for a living and I told him I was a lawyer.
caption: i understand completely there s nothing more horrifying than embarrassing yourself in front of your in laws as a matter of fact when i started dating judy i was unemployed her father asked me what i did for a living i told him i was a lawyer

utterances.transcript: What did you do when they found out?
caption: what d you do when they found out

utterances.transcript: They never did, so if ever see me giving them legal advice just nod along. Shall we?
caption: they never did so if you ever see me giving them legal advice just nod along shall we

utterances.transcript_with_note: (Chandler nods along and they enter the whirlpool room and remove their robes. Only Chandler is lacking a certain item of clothing. You see this is a coed whirlpool, which means swimsuits, and in fact there are two women already there and Chandler didn't seem to wear his. Needless to say, everyone is shocked, including Chandler.)

utterances.transcript: So I guess we wear swimsuits in here!
caption: so i guess we wear swimsuits in here

plots: Chandler spends time with Mr. Geller , and keeps having embarrassing moments at the gym.
Mr. Geller lied about being a lawyer .

utterances.transcript_with_note: [Scene: The Mr. Bowmont, is tied up alongside the pier; Joey and Rachel are relaxing.]

utterances.transcript: Well Joey, I hate to admit it, your way of sailing is a lot more fun.
caption: well joey i hate to admit it your way of sailing is a lot more fun

utterances.transcript: Yeah, yeah. Hey, why don't you give a pull on that rope?
utterances.transcript_with_note: Yeah, yeah. Hey, why don't you give a pull on that rope? (Points.)
caption: yep yep hey why don t you give a pull on that rope

utterances.transcript: Ohh we're not sailing.
caption: we re not sailing

utterances.transcript: Just pull on it.
caption: just pull on it

utterances.transcript: All right. Hey-hey-hey!! Sandwiches!
utterances.transcript_with_note: All right. (She does so and it brings the cooler closer together.) Hey-hey-hey!! (Sees what's in the cooler.) Sandwiches!

utterances.transcript: What else?
caption: what else

utterances.transcript: Here you go.
utterances.transcript_with_note: (hands him one) Here you go.

utterances.transcript: Thank you.

utterances.transcript: Oh wow!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Oh wow! (She takes a bite, but holds the sandwich vertically so that the stuff falls out.)

utterances.transcript: What are you doing?
caption: what are you doing

utterances.transcript: Ohh, sorry.
caption: oops sorry

utterances.transcript: What you-don't hold it like that! You're lettin' all the good stuff fall out.
caption: don t hold it like that you re letting all the good stuff fall out

utterances.transcript_with_note: (More falls out.)

utterances.transcript: Ohh whoops.

utterances.transcript: Careful! You're wasting good pastrami! Oh my God! I'm my dad!
utterances.transcript_with_note: Careful! You're wasting good pastrami! (Gasps.) Oh my God! I'm my dad!
